meanings.definition: To transfer data from a local computer to a remote computer or server.
meanings.sent1: I need to upload my photos to the cloud.
meanings.sent2: She always uploads her documents to the shared drive.
meanings.sent3: The computer tried to upload a banana instead of a file!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an upload of joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The upload of information was as swift as a cheetah.

meanings.definition: The act of transferring data from a local computer to a remote computer or server.
meanings.sent1: The upload of the video took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: He checked the upload progress of the file.
meanings.sent3: The upload decided to take a break and have a cup of tea.
meanings.sent4: The upload of emotions in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The upload of files was like a parade of information.
